_header: Thou lovely lord of Ilkley lede
Note: Followed by three English metrical prayers, in couplets: 1702, 1717, 1751.
Title(s): ‘De Vita et conversacione Sancti Roberti juxta Knaresburge’
Subjects: Knaresborough, Robert of, saint, life of
_description: ‘De Vita et conversacione Sancti Roberti juxta Knaresburge’ — 1164 lines in couplets, including a Prologue of 34 lines and an Epilogue of 154 lines

BLEge3143.First Lines:
Thou luffly lord of ylkay ledeCrist þat we knaw by our
                    crede…
BLEge3143.Last Lines:
…To the whike he brynge þou all and meAmen Amen per
                    charite
BLEge3143.Attributed Title:
De vita et conueracione sancti Roberti iuxta Knaresbride
                    (rubricated, f. 39v)

Haslewood,  Joseph,
                        ed.  
             The Metrical Life of Saint Robert of Knaresborough.
         London: A. J. Valpy, 1824: 1-48.
Bazire,  Joyce,
                        ed.  
             The Metrical Life of St. Robert of Knaresborough, together with the
